content: Singaporean singer **Daren Tan Xuan Yu** (born 22 February 1983) is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singapore) singer. He was the winner of [Project Superstar](/wiki/Project_Superstar) Season 2. He has been listed among [CLEO magazine](/wiki/Cleo_(magazine))'s 50 Most Eligible Bachelors. He changed his Chinese name to Chén Xuān Yù in 2014, and this was formally announced in Project Superstar 3 live show on national TV on 25 August 2014. ## Discography Tan's debut album, titled *Regardless*, was released islandwide on January 26, 2008. One of his songs, "Dou Shen", is the theme song for the popular Mediacorp drama *[Metamorphosis](/wiki/Metamorphosis_(TV_series))*. The first song in his debut album, titled "Regardless" (Bu Xu Li You) is actually a remake of [Melee](/wiki/Melee_(band))'s single "[Built To Last](/wiki/Built_To_Last_(M%C3%AAl%C3%A9e%27s_song))". ## Filmography ### Film YearTitleRoleNotes**2013***[That Girl in Pinafore](/wiki/That_Girl_in_Pinafore)*Jiaming**2015***[Mr. Unbelievable](/wiki/Mr._Unbelievable)*TV Male Lead ### Television YearTitleRoleNotesRef**2013***Mata Mata*Lim Seng Hock**2014***Mata Mata 2: A New Era***2015***Koji Cooks**Mata Mata 3: A New Generation*Lim Kiat "Kenny"**2016***[House of Fortune](/wiki/House_of_Fortune)* 钱来运转Bobby[*The Queen*](/wiki/The_Queen_(Singaporean_TV_series)) 复仇女王Zhao Xianghai 赵向海**2019***[128 Circle](/wiki/128_Circle)*Dominic Yang ### Personal life Tan was educated at Bukit Panjang Pri School, [Gan Eng Seng School](/wiki/Gan_Eng_Seng_School) and [Ngee Ann Polytechnic](/wiki/Ngee_Ann_Polytechnic). Tan founded Cahoots Social Network, an influencer marketing agency in 2016. Tan married Dr. Nadia Lum in November 2017, after having met through a mutual friend and got engaged after dating for almost two years. Their first child, a girl was born on 22 December 2018. Their second child, a boy, was born on 30 May 2022. ## Awards - [Project Superstar](/wiki/Project_Superstar) Season 2 Male Champion - [Project Superstar](/wiki/Project_Superstar) Season 2 Overall Champion - Cleo's Most Eligible Bachelor (2008) - 'Daren edges out Diya to take the crown' - Daren Tan's Personal Blog - Daren Tan's Official Facebook Page Preceded by[Kelvin Tan](/wiki/Kelvin_Tan) **Winner of *[Project SuperStar](/wiki/Project_SuperStar)*** [2006–07](/wiki/Project_SuperStar_Season_2_(2006%E2%80%9307))Succeeded by[Alfred Sim](/wiki/Alfred_Sim) This Singaporean biographical article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Daren Tan
